subtests.name: Mismatching the top-level schema / should throw for top-level non-objects
Mismatching the top-level schema / should throw if imports is a non-object
Mismatching the top-level schema / should throw if scopes is a non-object
Mismatching the top-level schema / should ignore unspecified top-level entries
Mismatching the specifier map schema / should ignore entries where the address is not a string, array, or null
Mismatching the specifier map schema / should ignore entries where the specifier key is an empty string
Mismatching the specifier map schema / should ignore members of an address array that are not strings
Mismatching the specifier map schema / should throw if a scope's value is not an object
Normalization / should normalize empty import maps to have imports and scopes keys
Normalization / should normalize an import map without imports to have imports
Normalization / should normalize an import map without scopes to have scopes
Normalization / should normalize addresses to arrays
